column4: Is there anyone who knows how to revert from the nvidia OSS driver to the Nvidia binary driver through SSH? A friend of mine uninstalled the Nvidia binary driver but got a black screen after restart, but I am able to SSH in to his box..
you mean install the nvidia-current package to reinstall the nvidia driver?  :)
: I've tried that, does not work
Hmm. thats all ive ever had to install on my problem machines.
